name: @zphhpzzph/vue-route-gen
description: Vue 3 route generator for file-based routing

scripts.pre-release: pnpm run build && npm publish --access public --registry https://registry.npmjs.org/
scripts.release: pnpm run build && npm publish --access public --registry https://registry.npmjs.org/
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && pnpm run release
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && pnpm run release
scripts.release:major: npm version major && pnpm run release
scripts.release:pre: npm version prepatch && pnpm run pre-release
scripts.release:preminor: npm version preminor && pnpm run pre-release
scripts.release:premajor: npm version premajor && pnpm run pre-release

author: z-ph
